Think of it as Pilates for your scalp barrier—flexible, resilient, and ready for growth.

overview.content: Polynucleotides act like a hydration magnet and anti-inflammatory shield. By repairing scalp tissue, they create the perfect environment for follicles to absorb nutrients and grow thicker strands. We use PN injections to soothe scalps irritated by stress, styling, or medication, and to maintain results between PRP/exosome sessions.
